item.title: 美元因利率前景疲软，黄金创历史新高
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市走高，美元徘徊在五周低点附近，黄金攀升至历史新高，投资者在为本周一系列经济数据做准备，包括周五至关重要的美国劳工报告。【原文：Asian stocks edged higher while the dollar lurked near five-week lows and gold climbed to a record high on Tuesday, as investors girded for a slate of economic data this week, including the crucial U.S. labour report on Friday.】

item.title: 劳动节假期结束后，交易员重返市场，美元承压
item.description: 在美国市场于劳动节假期结束后于周二晚些时候重新开市之前，美元在亚洲早盘交易中经历了连续数日的抛售后出现了小幅回升。【原文：The U.S. dollar made a limp recovery in early Asian trade after days of selling, ahead of the U.S. markets reopening later on Tuesday after the Labor Day holiday.】

item.title: 俄乌紧张局势加剧供应担忧，石油价格上涨
item.description: 周二亚市早盘，油价上涨，原因是俄罗斯和乌克兰之间的冲突升级，市场对供应中断的担忧加剧。【原文：Oil prices rose in early Asia trade on Tuesday as concerns about supply disruptions grew amid an escalation of the conflict between Russia and Ukraine.】

item.title: 日本邮政银行将于 2026 年推出数字日元
item.description: 日本邮政银行表示，将在 2026 财年末推出数字日元，以方便储户进行数字金融交易。【原文：Japan Post Bank said it would launch a digital yen by the end of fiscal 2026 to make it more convenient for its depositors to make digital financial transactions.】

item.title: 贝森特表示，特朗普政府将采取新措施解决住房成本高的问题
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周一在接受路透社采访时表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府计划在未来几周内采取新措施解决住房成本高的问题。【原文：President Donald Trump's administration plans new measures to tackle the high cost of housing in the coming weeks, U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent told Reuters in an interview on Monday.】

item.title: 贝森特预计最高法院将支持特朗普关税的合法性，但也在考虑 B 计划
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周一表示，相信最高法院会支持唐纳德-特朗普总统利用1977年的紧急权力法对大多数贸易伙伴征收全面关税的做法，但他同时表示，如果最高法院不支持这一做法，美国政府也有后备计划。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Monday expressed confidence that the Supreme Court will uphold President Donald Trump's use of a 1977 emergency powers law to impose sweeping tariffs on most trading partners, but said the administration has a backup plan if it does not.】

item.title: 独家报道财政部长贝森特：美联储应该独立，但也犯过错误
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周一表示，美联储是独立的，也应该是独立的，但他说美联储 "犯了很多错误"，并为唐纳德-特朗普总统因抵押贷款欺诈指控而解雇美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）的权利辩护。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Monday the Federal Reserve is and should be independent but said it had "made a lot of mistakes" and defended President Donald Trump's right to fire Fed Governor Lisa Cook over allegations of mortgage fraud.】

item.title: 雀巢任命 Philipp Navratil 为首席执行官
item.description: 雀巢公司周一表示，在洛朗-弗莱克西（Laurent Freixe）离职后，该公司已任命菲利普-纳夫拉蒂尔（Philipp Navratil）为首席执行官。【原文：Nestlé said on Monday that it has appointed Philipp Navratil as CEO following the departure of Laurent Freixe.】

item.title: 欧洲监管机构称代币化股票存在 "投资者误解 "风险
item.description: 欧盟证券监管机构周一表示，基于区块链的资产提供股票风险敞口可能会导致 "投资者误解"，因为这些资产通常不会使买方成为相关公司的股东。【原文：Blockchain-based assets which provide exposure to equities could lead to "investor misunderstanding", as they typically do not make the buyer a shareholder in the underlying company, the European Union's securities watchdog said on Monday.】

item.title: 独家报道：首席执行官称，威兹航空正在与普惠公司达成协议，以帮助清除发动机维修障碍
item.description: 威兹航空公司（Wizz Air）首席执行官周一告诉路透社，该公司正在努力与 RTX 旗下的喷气发动机制造商普惠公司（Pratt & Whitney）达成协议，以加快发动机的维修工作。【原文：Wizz Air is working towards a deal with RTX-owned jet engine maker Pratt & Whitney to accelerate the servicing of its engines, delays with which have left large chunks of the European low-cost carrier's fleet grounded, its CEO told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 中国 CATL 出售芬兰转包汽车制造商股份
item.description: 芬兰政府周一表示，在欧洲电动汽车销售低迷的情况下，中国电池制造商当代安培科技公司（CATL）将向芬兰政府和另一家股东出售其在芬兰汽车制造商瓦尔梅特汽车公司（Valmet Automotive）分包合同中持有的20.6%股份。【原文：Chinese battery maker Contemporary Amperex Technology (CATL) is selling its 20.6% stake in subcontract Finnish car maker Valmet Automotive to the Finnish state and another shareholder, Finland's government said on Monday, amid low electric car sales in Europe.】

item.title: 比亚迪自 2020 年以来首次录得月度产量连续下降
item.description: 比亚迪 8 月份的产量连续第二个月下滑，这是自 2020 年以来的首次连续月度萎缩，进一步表明这家中国电动车巨头正在为其多年来的大规模扩张踩刹车。【原文：BYD's production slid for a second straight month in August, marking its first consecutive monthly contraction since 2020 in a further sign that the Chinese EV giant is putting the brakes on its massive years-long expansion.】

item.title: 特朗普称印度提出将美国商品关税降至零
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一表示，印度已提出将其对美国商品的关税降至零。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday that India has offered to reduce its tariffs on U.S. goods to zero.】

item.title: 消息人士称，奥迪考虑在战略调整中实现创纪录的 200 万辆汽车销售目标
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，根据大众汽车旗下高端品牌奥迪预计将于今年晚些时候发布的新战略，奥迪的长期目标是年销量至少达到200万辆，比2024年增长五分之一。【原文：Volkswagen's Audi could target long-term annual sales of at least 2 million cars, up a fifth from 2024, under a new strategy the premium brand is expected to release later this year, according to a person close to the matter.】

item.title: 欧盟防务专员称欧盟将加强卫星防御以抵御 GPS 干扰
item.description: 欧盟防务专员安德里乌斯-库比留斯（Andrius Kubilius）周一表示，欧盟将在低地球轨道部署更多卫星，以加强抵御 GPS 干扰的能力，并将提高探测 GPS 干扰的能力。【原文：The European Union will deploy additional satellites in low Earth orbit to strengthen resilience against GPS interferences and will improve capabilities to detect it, EU Defence Commissioner Andrius Kubilius said on Monday.】

item.title: 更多投资者反对欧洲企业的高管薪酬计划
item.description: 公司治理咨询公司乔治森（Georgeson）的数据显示，欧洲最大的上市公司因高管薪酬计划而面临投资者动荡的数量今年增加了近四分之一，其中西班牙会议上的反叛事件激增。【原文：The number of Europe's biggest listed firms to face investor unrest over their executive pay plans rose by nearly a quarter this year, led by a jump in revolts at meetings in Spain, data from corporate governance consultants Georgeson showed.】

item.title: 特朗普的世界自由金融代币开始交易
item.description: 加密货币公司表示，支持特朗普家族加密货币企业 World Liberty Financial 的部分数字代币已于周一开始交易。【原文：Some of the digital tokens backing the Trump family's cryptocurrency venture, World Liberty Financial, began trading on Monday, the cryptocurrency company said.】

item.title: 分析师称空客 8 月交付约 60 架飞机后将面临冲刺目标的挑战
item.description: 业内人士和分析师周一表示，空中客车公司在 8 月份交付了约 60 架飞机后，需要以创纪录的速度交付飞机，以实现其年度目标。【原文：Airbus needs to deliver planes at a record pace to reach its annual target after delivering about 60 aircraft in August, industry sources and analysts said on Monday.】

item.title: 据 Semafor 报道，阿布扎比支持的 G42 公司旨在使人工智能园区的芯片供应商多样化
item.description: 据 Semafor 周一援引一位直接了解谈判情况的人士的话报道，阿布扎比支持的科技集团 G42 旨在为阿联酋-美国人工智能园区提供除英伟达（Nvidia）之外的多样化芯片供应商。【原文：Abu Dhabi-backed technology group G42 aims to diversify chip suppliers beyond Nvidia for the UAE-U.S. AI campus, Semafor reported on Monday, citing a person with direct knowledge of the talks.】

item.title: 在墨西哥边境小镇，特朗普关税导致数千人失业
item.description: 法比奥拉-加利西亚（Fabiola Galicia）在德克萨斯州埃尔帕索市边境另一端的华雷斯城一家生产装饰丝带的工厂里工作了 11 年，一路步步高升。她从生产线工人做起，最终晋升为管理 30 名员工的经理。【原文：For 11 years, Fabiola Galicia worked her way up the ranks at a factory that produced decorative ribbons in Ciudad Juarez, just across the border from El Paso, Texas. Starting as a production line worker, she was eventually promoted to manager overseeing 30 employees.】

item.title: 特斯拉在部分欧洲市场的销量下滑已持续第八个月
item.description: 由于来自中国电动汽车竞争对手和传统汽车制造商的竞争日益激烈，以及对首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）讨好极右翼政党的反弹，特斯拉 8 月份在一些欧洲市场的销售颓势已持续到第八个月。【原文：Tesla's sales rout in some European markets extended to an eighth month in August amid mounting competition from both Chinese EV rivals and traditional automakers, as well as a backlash against CEO Elon Musk's courting of far-right parties.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Finastra 考虑以 10 亿美元出售中东和亚洲业务
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士透露，金融软件公司 Finastra 正在探索出售其中东和亚洲核心银行部门，交易价格可能超过 10 亿美元。【原文：Financial software company Finastra is exploring a sale of its Middle Eastern and Asian core banking unit, two people familiar with the matter said, in a deal that could fetch more than $1 billion.】

item.title: 雷诺聘请前梅赛德斯高管卡特琳-阿特管理达契亚品牌
item.description: 法国汽车制造商雷诺公司周一表示，该公司任命前梅赛德斯-奔驰副总裁卡特琳-阿德特（Katrin Adt）担任其低成本品牌达契亚（Dacia）的总经理，在新任首席执行官弗朗索瓦-普罗沃斯特（Francois Provost）的领导下对管理团队进行了重组。【原文：French carmaker Renault appointed former Mercedes-Benz vice president Katrin Adt as managing director of its low-cost Dacia brand, the company said on Monday, as it revamps its management team under new CEO Francois Provost.】

item.title: 英国凯诺斯公司因乐观的年度前景而跃升
item.description: 凯诺斯公司周一股价大涨超过 16%，此前这家 IT 软件开发商表示，受过去五个月销售强劲的帮助，预计其年度前景将达到一致预测的上限。【原文：Shares of Kainos jumped more than 16% on Monday after the IT software developer said it was expecting its annual outlook to be at the upper end of consensus forecasts, helped by sturdy sales in the last five months.】

item.title: 英国采购经理人指数（PMI）显示：新订单回落，英国工厂步履蹒跚
item.description: 据周一公布的一项调查显示，由于担心国外贸易紧张局势和国内税收增加，英国制造商在出现新订单下降的复苏迹象后，8 月份又遭遇了新的挫折。【原文：Britain's manufacturers suffered a fresh setback in August after signs of a recovery with new orders dropping due to worries about trade tensions abroad and tax increases at home, according to a survey published on Monday.】

item.title: 印度石油部长否认该国从俄罗斯进口产品中牟取暴利
item.description: 印度石油部长哈迪普-辛格-普里（Hardeep Singh Puri）周一在《印度教徒报》上说，印度并没有从俄罗斯的石油进口中 "牟取暴利"，印度的石油采购稳定了市场，同时使价格没有上涨到每桶 200 美元。【原文：India is not "profiteering" from Russian oil imports and its purchases have stabilised markets while keeping prices from rising to as much as $200 a barrel, Hardeep Singh Puri, country's oil minister, said in the Hindu newspaper on Monday.】

item.title: 印度强劲的经济增长未能给股票投资者留下深刻印象
item.description: 由于定价能力减弱和美国关税对企业盈利造成压力，外国投资者纷纷撤离，印度举世瞩目的经济增长未能转化为股市收益。【原文：India's world-beating economic growth is failing to translate into gains for equity markets as weakening pricing power and U.S. tariffs weigh on corporate earnings, turning foreign investors away.】

item.title: 特斯拉 8 月份在瑞典的注册量暴跌 84
item.description: 瑞典移动通信公司（Mobility Sweden）周一提供的数据显示，8月份瑞典的特斯拉新车注册量同比下降了84%，仅为210辆。【原文：Registrations of new Tesla cars in Sweden fell 84% in August from a year earlier, to 210 vehicles, data from Mobility Sweden showed on Monday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德警告特朗普干预美联储给世界经济带来风险
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）周一表示，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普解除美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔或美联储理事丽莎-库克的职务，那么这将对美国经济和世界经济构成 "非常严重的危险"。【原文：If U.S. President Donald Trump removed Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell or Fed governor Lisa Cook, then this would represent a "very serious danger for the U.S. economy and the world economy", the European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said on Monday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，OpenAI 计划在印度建立至少 1 千兆瓦容量的数据中心
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引未具名消息人士的话报道，ChatGPT 的母公司 OpenAI 正在寻找当地合作伙伴，以便在印度建立一个容量至少为 1 千兆瓦的数据中心。【原文：ChatGPT parent OpenAI is scouting local partners to set up a data center in India with at least 1 gigawatt capacity, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing unidentified sources.】
